tv_series.id, tv_series.title, tv_series.description, vanity_tv_series_url.url AS vanity, tomatometer_info_tv.tomatometer value, /* TODO enforce tomatometer=null when state=NA */ CASE WHEN tomatometer_info_tv.certified_fresh THEN 'certified_fresh' WHEN tomatometer_info_tv.num_reviews < 5 THEN 'NA' WHEN tomatometer_info_tv.tomatometer IS NULL THEN 'NA' WHEN (tomatometer_info_tv.tomatometer >= 60) THEN 'fresh' ELSE 'rotten' END AS state
FROM tv_series LEFT JOIN tomatometer_info_tv ON tomatometer_info_tv.media_type='SR' AND tomatometer_info_tv.media_id=tv_series.id LEFT JOIN vanity_tv_series_url ON vanity_tv_series_url.tv_series_id = tv_series.id
